original_text: People will be cruel to each other. Men will argue against one another and neighbours will fight each other. Young people will insult older people. And useless people will speak against people that they should respect.
korean_text: 백성이 서로 학대하며 각기 이웃을 잔해하며 아이가 노인에게, 비천한 자가 존귀한 자에게 교만할 것이며

sentences.original_text: People will be cruel to each other
Men will argue against one another
and neighbours will fight each other
Young people will insult older people
sentences.korean_translation: 젊은 사람들이 나이 많은 사람들을 모욕할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And useless people will speak against people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 쓸모없는 사람들이 사람들에게 말할 것입니다
